ComicInfo.Summary: This is the 2002 Dawn Convention sketchbook collection. 30 pages of Dawn in a range of clothes and poses with foreword by Linsner reminiscing on his early years as a convention sketching wannabe artist. Linsner's convention sketchbooks are just that.. sketches done at conventions for sale. Most of them are quick and simple and studies of dawn in poses and outfits, with the occasional other character thrown in. This is one for the Dawn / Linsner collectors and those who are interested in ideas of how convention sketching is done.
